content: SB6 Band saw blade Premium blade for low-noise, cold cutting through metal and plastic using SB 6-22 deep cut band saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - ### FEATURES:Features Uncompromising cutting performance – the blade toothing has been precision engineered for fast, clean cutting while reducing noise and debris Higher durability – increased flexibility makes these band saw blades more resistant to damage under jobsite conditions Blade printing – key information, including teeth-per-inch (TPI), is shown on every blade Complete range – four TPI options available for tougher metal cutting tasks, from thick pipes/girders to thinner strut Applications Cutting metal pipes, strut, threaded rod, modular girders, rebar, etc. Cutting stainless steel, carbon steel, aluminum, non-ferrous metal Cutting plastics Fast, rough cutting – choose a lower TPI blade Fine, smooth cutting – choose a higher TPI blade ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Metal, Steel, Stainless steel, Non-ferrous metal, Plastic Product Class: Premium Technical Data | Base material | Metal, Steel, Stainless steel, Non-ferrous metal, Plastic | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2399052 - Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 10/14 (2) - Package Size 2 pc - 2399053 - Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 14/18 (2) - Package Size 2 pc - 2399055 - Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 24 (2) - Package Size 2 pc - 3866738 - Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 10/14 (60 pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 60x Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 10/14 (2) - 3866739 - Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 14/18 (60 pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 60x Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 14/18 (2) - 3866740 - Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 24 (60 pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 60x Band saw blade SP 44-7/8 24 (2)
